heading: IZiyon neentombi zayo ziya kukhululwa kwaye zihlanjululwe ngomhla weMileniyam—Thelekisa Isaya 4. Malunga 559–545 P.K.

verses.txt: Kwaye ngaloo mhla, abafazi abasixhenxe baya kubambelela ndodeni-nye, besithi: Siya kudla esethu isonka, kwaye sambathe ezethu iingubo; kuphela nje sivumele sibizwe ngegama lakho ukuze kusuke ukungcikiveka kwethu.
Ngaloo mhla isebe leNkosi liya kubukeka kwaye libe nobuqaqawuli; isiqhamo somhlaba sibalasele kwaye sibe sihle kubo abo basabayo kwaSirayeli.
Kwaye kuya kwenzeka, abo baseleyo eZiyon baze basale eYerusalem baya kubizwa ngokuba bangcwele, bonke ababhalwe phakathi kwabaphilayo eYerusalem—
Xa sukuba iNkosi ibuhlambile ubunyhuku-nyhuku beentombi zayo iZiyon, kwaye ilihlambulule igazi leYerusalem phakathi kwayo ngomoya wokugweba nangomoya wokutshisa.

Kwaye iNkosi iya kudala phezu kwayo yonke indawo yokuhlala yentaba yeZiyon, naphezu kweendibano zabo, ilifu nomsi emini nokukhazimla kwamadangatye omlilo ngobusuku; kuba ngaphezu kwabo bonke ubuqaqawuli bayo iZiyon buya kuba lukhuseleko.
Kwaye kuya kubakho umnquba womthunzi emini ebushushwini, nendawo yokuzimela, nekhusi kulo uqhwithela, isiphango nasemvuleni.
